name: reversible cross-collar cowl
notes:
materials

2 skeins of purl soho’s [nigh dk][2], 100% cashmere. each skein is 199 yards/ 55 grams

- color a: 1 skein; approximately 170 yards required
- color b: 1 skein; approximately 170 yards required

you’ll also need…

- us 6 (4 mm), 24-inch [circular needles][3]

for more pretty pairings to inspire you, click [here][4]!

samples: we used pink pearl + morning sky, raindrop blue + sugar maple, and ocean storm + warm cognac for our cowls.

gauge
20 stitches and 31 rows = 4 inches in stockinette stitch, blocked

size

- finished neck opening: approximately 18 inches circumference, comfortably stretching an additional 5 inches
- finished height from point: 10 inches

designed by purl soho designer, [gianna mueller][5]. click [here][6] to see even more of gianna’s designs!


  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/nigh-dk.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/2023/09/18/reversible-cross-collar-cowl/
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/
  [6]: https://www.instagram.com/giannaknits/
